name: Bo at.
description:
Just your typical endless running game, but it's a boat!

Nothing really to say about this game lmao. It's just an endless running game! About a boat!! Play this game on a browser or download it to your android devices!

This is just a game I've made on my free time. I wanted to create something simple, but ended up procrastinating for months. I've decided to cut the game's scope and stick with it. And hey! Finishing a bad game is an achievement too :D
